title: Gnyabagam Varugiradha Lyrics Vishwaroopam 2
stanzas:
Gnyabagam Varugiradha - ivan
thee endru therigiratha
thadaigalai vendre
sarithiram padaithavan
Gnyabagam Varugiradha

neerindri verillia
ivan yaarukkum arasanillai
kaadugal thaandi
kadakindra pozhudhum
kaatrukku kaayamillai.

yevan endru ninaithaai
edhai kandu sirithai
velippadum
pudhu suyaroobam

neruppuku pirandhaan
nitham valarndhaan
velippadum
pudhu suyaroobam

vishwaroopam
roopam roopam (3)

seo.description: Get the complete Gnyabagam Varugiradha Lyrics Vishwaroopam 2  from Vishwaroopam 2. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and sung by Arvind Srinivas. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
